column2: Source: City of Toronto open data portal. The general quality and availability of this data source is poor. Caution: The 2017 dataset is not yet available from this data source. Revenues from 2011 â€“ 2012 do not include propety tax. The 2016 dataset is incomplete, and preliminary. The 2013 dataset is staff recommended. The data contain anomalies. Roughly estimated re-allocations for continuity have been applied to the earlier years.
